snippet.title: Shooting Heart - Doujin shmup (1999) All stages (Akari Kamigishi)
snippet.description:
** A broken image sometimes appears because the VGA to HDMI converter is bad. **

Shooting Heart is a horizontal shoot'em up doujin PC game released in 1999 by Asys. It's derivative of a visual novel 'To Heart'.

Title: Shooting Heart
Developer: Asys
Released year: 1999
Genre: Horizontal shoot'em up
Media: 1 x CD-ROM

Platform: Windows 98 SE
CPU: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz
GPU: Matrox Millennium G400
Play date: 2016/09/01
Player character: Akari Kamigishi (神岸 あかり)
Final score: x (11 misses, 3 continues)

The MIDI is played with my Roland SC-88Pro (SC-55 mode).
